ValidationRule.description: Can't send an email if their is no Account or Contact related to the parent case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Permission.ByPassVR = FALSE, Parent.Admin_Case__c = FALSE,
AND( ISBLANK( Parent.AccountId ), ISBLANK( Parent.ContactId ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot send an Email if there is no Account or Contact on the parent Case.
